title: A golden mirrour conteining certaine pithie and figuratiue visions prognosticating good fortune to England and all true  English subiectes, with an ouerthrowe to the enemies : whereto be adioyned certaine pretie poemes written on the names of sundrie both noble and worshipfull.
author: Robinson, Richard, fl. 1574.
publisher: Printed by Roger Ward for Iohn Proctor, and are to be solde at his shop vpon Holborne Bridge,
notes: Attributed to Richard Robinson by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
